student Perspicacity. When Channing Pollock came to the Johns Hopkins

to its readers in explicit but properly restrained terms
that it considered
him an impossible stuffed shirt. It also endorsed a policy
of submerging
intercollegiate football in favor of intramural sports.
All of this, it seems
to me, shows a commendable maturity.
